revised_title: The Effect of Light on Chemical Dynamics and Equilibria
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to study the effect of light on chemical dynamics and equilibria. They used the reaction between carbon monoxide and chlorine as a model system and found that light can accelerate the reaction. The authors developed a method to control the intensity and purity of the light source to obtain reliable results. Their work provides insights into the fundamental understanding of light-induced chemical reactions.
